Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides supported accommodation, initially in shared 2 bedroom properties, for single homeless people aged 18-65 years. Has supported accommodation in bedsits and flats, which are for people who are ready to move from shared accommodation. Also provides supported accommodation for single people through a link service with Sheffield Homes. Target has recently acquired funding from the National Offenders Service and now has 6 bed spaces available for women in their Female Offenders Mental Health Support Services (FOMHSS). Referral by the Probation Service, social workers, substance misuse agencies, health professionals and GPs. People can also self refer. Target also has supported accommodation in Rotherham.
